episodes.title: AD #300: This Place Is A Zoo

episodes.summary: This week you'll hear about Anderson's trip to sensitivity training, Mike's long-suffering pants/shorts saga, a tale of road rage, Tyler's odd encounter with Morrissey and a startling hair-related revelation.

episodes.title: AD #298: Lara's Willy Whistles
episodes.summary: We're all in a very special mood tonight, including our special guest Tara.

episodes.title: AD #297: Camp Sausage
episodes.summary:
Anderson is back from the camp he volunteers at every year and has a multitude of stories. You may have heard his previous camp ADventures, but he's never woven such an immersive tale as this. By the end, you'll feel like a camper yourself. 

 

Connect with the show, brah:

twitter.com/AfterDisaster

Facebook.com/AfterDisaster

theafterdisaster.com

episodes.title: AD #296: Sad Times, Good Times
episodes.summary: We recorded this on Saturday (7/25) in Anderson's backyard before Beauty went off to camp.

episodes.title: AD #295: Confederate Porn
episodes.summary:
The three of us are reunited and ready to fill your ears with ignorance again! We spil the details on the Destination Disaster (available here: http://gum.co/DestinationDisaster), Tyler's convo with Judd Apatow about Mike, Anderson's trip to Washington D.C., the Confederate Flag, caves, Muslims, and a dude who took a giant metal rod through his head in the 1800s. 

It's about as ignorant as it sounds. Enjoy!

episodes.title: AD #294: The AD Gets Zitty!
episodes.summary: Anderson and Mike leave their comfort zones and join the gals from the Getting Zitty podcast in a hot tub. Tyler misses out because of something called, "a job."

episodes.title: AD #293: Something Is Missing
episodes.summary: Tyler is out celebrating his wedding anniversary, so Anderson and Mike try to find a replacement on Craigslist.

episodes.title: AD #292: Local Gas Price Chat
episodes.summary: What gas station has the lowest gas prices near you? Catch this and MORE scintillating chat on this week's After Disaster.

episodes.title: AD #291: Trying To Eat Quietly
episodes.summary: Tyler's in Italy. Anderson and Mike go out to eat, then to a bar.

episodes.title: AD #290: Goddamit
episodes.summary: Goddamit you guys.

episodes.title: AD #289: Gouda, Grammys and Grannies
episodes.summary:
Featuring special guest, Kevin "Gouda" Schatz.

Anderson met Mike's dad, is having troubles with his trash cans and has a "great" new tip for drying your hands. We also tackle a rather difficult ADvice email and read an email taking us to task for our ignorance of Middle America.

episodes.title: AD #288: Remove This Worm
episodes.summary: Anderson regales us with harrowing tales of adventuring and we all eat some questionable things sent to the PO Box.

episodes.title: AD #287: Don't Listen To This, You Person
episodes.summary: We get into a lengthy discussion about a touchy subject, a selfie gone wrong and so much more.

episodes.title: AD #286: Bye Bye Birdie
episodes.summary: Anderson has a hot Russian doctor story and a tale of golfing gone wrong, Tyler's sloshed from a party and Tara Lynne Barr joins the fun.

episodes.title: AD #285: Meet Duped Guy
episodes.summary: We check in with an old friend with a terrible job, we tiptoe into Mike's neurosis, we "invent" a new comedic device, and we open a couple packages at the VERY end of the show.

episodes.title: AD 284: Russell Ying's Big Adventure
episodes.summary: We're back, we're in a weird studio, Anderson has a new passion and someone sent us something to the PO Box that is... alivel

episodes.title: AD #141: Coco Pabs
episodes.summary:
(An upload from the vault of past shows not currently available on our feed.)

May 25, 2012 -- Anderson was caught doing something shameful in his kitchen, callers call in with their (lack of) talents, we listen to our latest Parent Review, and then come up with our latest hair brained idea that will never come to fruition.

episodes.title: AD #283: A Man, A Plan, A Carano
episodes.summary:
Birthday boy Keith has big plans for this calendar year, Anderson had an awkward encounter with a cholo and the PO Box continues to overflow with goodies.  

Get in on the fun: After Disaster, PO Box 570058, Tarzana, CA 91357

episodes.title: AD #282: ROAR
episodes.summary: More PO Box surprises, updates on Anderson's dad, drunk regrets and we begin our obsession with a crazy film from the 70's.

episodes.title: AD #281: Daddy Issues and Frank Discussions
episodes.summary: Anderson's dad's new living arrangements haven't exactly gone as planned, Tyler's tipsy and insists on being in the same room as Mike and Anderson, and listeners are sending us WORK in the new P.O. Box.

episodes.title: AD #280: Car Troubles and Beach Kerfuffles
episodes.summary: We're vaping our gourds off, opening mysterious packages and discussing the beach, Anderson's p.o.s car and the troubles our podcast has created for at least one fine gentlemen.
